SA20n1315:3: yā pratisaṃkhyānabalasanniśrayeṇa vā prakṛtyā vā parāpakārasya marṣaṇā sarveṣāñca marṣaṇā sarvasya ca marṣaṇā nirāmiṣeṇa ca cittena kevalayā karuṇayā [marṣaṇā] |
SA20n1315:12: tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvaḥ parāpakāraṃ marṣayati kṣamate |
SA20n1315:13: iha bodhisattvastīvre nirantare citre dīrghakālikea'pi parāpakāraje duḥkhe sammukhībhūte idaṃ pratisaṃśikṣate |
SA20n1315:15: yenāhaṃ svayaṃkṛtasyāśubhasya karmaṇo duḥkhamīdṛśaṃ phalaṃ pratyanubhavāmi |
SA20n1315:23: tatpare tāvadajñāḥ ye asmākaṃ prakṛtiduḥkhitānāṃ bhūyo duḥkhamupasaṃharanti |
SA20n1315:24: asmākaṃ tu vijñānāṃ satāṃ na pratirūpaṃ syādyadvayamapi pareṣāṃ prakṛtiduḥkhitānāṃ bhūyo duḥkhamupasaṃharemaḥ |
SA20n1315:25: bhūyo'pi cātmārthe tāvatprayuktānāṃ śrāvakāṇāmakṣāntirna yuktarūpā syāt svapareṣāṃ duḥkhajanikā |
SA20n1315:27: idaṃ pratisaṃkhyāya sa bodhisattvaḥ pañcākārāṃ saṃjñāṃ bhāvayan mitrāmitrodāsīnebhyaḥ hīnatulyaviśiṣṭebhyaḥ sukhitaduḥkhitebhyo guṇadoṣayuktebhyaśca sattvebhyaḥ sarvāpakārāṃstitikṣate |
SA20n1315:34: nāsau sattvaḥ sulabharūpo yo me na dīrghasyādhvano'tyayāt pūrvamanyāsu jātiṣu mātā vābhūt pitā vā bhrātā vā bhaginī vā ācāryo vā upādhyāyo vā gururvā gurusthānīyo vā |
SA20n1315:35: tasyaivaṃ yoniśo manasikurvataḥ pratyarthikasaṃjñā apakāriṣu sattveṣu antardhīyate suhṛtsaṃjñā ca saṃtiṣṭhate |
SA20n1315:36: sa tāṃ suhṛtsaṃjñāṃ niśrityāpakārān marṣayati kṣamate |
SA20n1315:37: kathañca bodhisattvaḥ apakāriṣu sattveṣu dharmamātrānusāriṇīṃ saṃjñāṃ bhāvayati |
SA20n1315:40: nāstyatra kaścidātmā vā sattvo vā jīvo vā janturvāya ākrośedroṣayettāḍayed bhaṇḍayet paribhāṣeta vā yo vā punarākruśyeta vā roṣyeta vā tāḍayeta vā bhaṇḍayeta vā paribhāṣyeta vā |
SA20n1315:43: sa tāṃ dharmamātrasaṃjñāniścitya pratiṣṭhāpya parataḥ sarvāpakārān marṣayati kṣamate |
SA20n1315:46: ye kecit sattvā jātā bhūtāḥ sarve te anityā maraṇadharmāṇaḥ |
SA20n1315:47: eṣa ca paramaḥ pratyatakāro yaduta jīvitādvayaparopaṇam |
SA20n1315:48: evañca prakṛttyā maraṇadharmakeṣvanityeṣu sattveṣu na pratirūpaṃ syādvijñapuruṣasya kaluṣamapi tāvaccittamutpādayituṃ prāgeva pāṇinā vā prahartuṃ loṣṭena vā daṇḍena vā prāgeva sarveṇa sarvaṃ jīvitādvyaparopayitum |
SA20n1315:49: tasyaivaṃ yoniśo manasi kurvataḥ nityasārasajñā ca prahīyate |
SA20n1315:51: sa tāmapi anityāsārasaṃjñāṃ niśritya sarvāpakārān marṣayati kṣamate |
SA20n1315:52: kathañca bodhisattvaḥ apakāriṣu sattveṣu duḥkhasaṃjñāṃ bhāvayati |
SA20n1315:53: iha bodhisattvo ye tāvat sattvā mahatyāmapi sampadi vartante tānapi tisṛbhiḥ duḥkhatābhiranuṣaktān paśyati-saṃskāraduḥkhatayā vipariṇāmaduḥkhatayā duḥkhaduḥkhatayā ca prāgeva vipattisthitān |
SA20n1315:55: evaṃ sadā duḥkhānugatānāṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhāpakarṣaṇāyāsmābhirvyāyacchitavyaṃ na duḥkhopasaṃhārāya |
SA20n1315:56: tasyaivaṃ yoniśo manasi kurvataḥ sukhasaṃjñā prahīyate duḥkhasaṃjñā cotpadyate |
SA20n1315:57: sa tāṃ duḥkhasaṃjñāṃ niśritya pareṣāṃ sarvāpakārān marṣayati kṣamate |
SA20n1315:60: mayā khalu sarvasattvā bodhāya cittamutpādayatā kaḍatrabhāvena parigṛhītāḥ |
SA20n1315:62: tanna me pratirūpaṃ syādyadahamevaṃ sarvasattvānupādāyaiṣāmarthaṃ kariṣyāmītyanarthameva kuryāmapakāramamarṣayan |
SA20n1315:63: tasyaiva yāniśo manasi kurvataḥ apakāriṣu sattveṣu parasaṃjñā prahīyate |
SA20n1315:65: sa tāṃ parigrahasajñāṃ niśritya pareṣāṃ sarvāpakārān marṣayati kṣamate |
SA20n1315:72: mayā khalu pūrva kāmacaryāsu vartamānena kāmānparyeṣatā pratisaṃkhyāya duḥkhahetutayā duḥkhātmakānāṃ kāmānāmarthe prabhūtāni tīvrāṇi duḥkhāni abhyupagatāni adhivāsitānyanubhūtāni kṛṣivaṇijyā rājapauruṣyaprayuktena |
SA20n1315:73: evaṃ tadvayarthaṃ duḥkhasyaivārthe mayā mahad duḥkhamabhyupagataṃ pratisaṃkhyāyājñānadoṣeṇa |
SA20n1315:74: sāṃprataṃ tu mama sukhāhārake kuśale prayuktasya [pratisaṃkhyāya] tataḥ koṭīśatasahasraguṇasya duḥkhasyādhivāsanābhyupagamaḥ pratirūpaḥ syāt |
SA20n1315:76: evaṃ yoniśo manasi kurvan bodhāya prayukto bodhisattvaḥ sarvavastukaṃ duḥkhamadhivāsayati |
SA20n1315:79: sanniśrayādhiṣṭhānaṃ lokadharmādhiṣṭhānam īryāpathādhiṣṭhānaṃ dharmaparigrahādhiṣṭhāna bhikṣākavṛttādhiṣṭhānam abhiyogaklamādhiṣṭhānaṃ sattvārthakriyādhiṣṭhānam itikaraṇīyādhiṣṭhānañceti |
SA20n1315:83: tairbodhisattvo lūhaiḥ stokairasatkṛtya dhandhañca labdhairnotkaṇṭhyate na paritrasyati nāpi tato nidānaṃ vīryaṃ sraṃsayati |
SA20n1315:86: alābhaḥ ayaśo nindā duḥkhaṃnāśadharmakasya nāśaḥ kṣayadharmakasya kṣayaḥ jarādharmakasya jarā vyādhidharmakasya vyādhiḥ maraṇadharmakasya maraṇam |
SA20n1315:87: eṣāṃ lokadharmāṇāṃ samastavyastānām āpatanāt sammukhībhāvāt yadduḥkhamutpadyate tallokadharmādhiṣṭhānamityucyate |
SA20n1315:88: tenāpi spṛṣṭo bodhisattvo na tannidānaṃ vīryaṃ sraṃsayati pratisaṃkhyāyodvahate adhivāsayati |
SA20n1315:91: tatra bodhisattvaḥ caṃkramaniṣadyābhyāṃ divārātrau vā āvaraṇīyebhyo dharmebhyaścittaṃ pariśodhayaṃstana nidānaṃ pariśramajaṃ duḥkhamadhivāsayati |
SA20n1315:92: na tvakāle pārśvamanuprayacchati mañce vā pīṭhe vā tṛṇasaṃstare vā parṇasaṃstare vā |
SA20n1315:94: ratnatrayapūjopasthānaṃ gurupūjopasthānaṃ dharmāṇāmudgrahaṇamudgṛhītānāṃ pareṣāṃ vistareṇa deśanā vistareṇa svareṇa svādhyāyakriyā ekākino rahogatasya samyak cintanā tulanā upaparīkṣaṇā yogamanasikārasaṃgṛhītā śamathavipaśyanā bhāvanā ca |
SA20n1315:95: asmin saptākāre dharmaparigrahe bodhisattvasya vyāyacchamānasya yad duḥkhamutpadyate tadapyasāvadhivāsayati |
SA20n1315:106: ityevaṃ rūpaṃ kṛcchrasaṃbādhaṃ bhikṣākavṛttamāgamya yadduḥkhamutpadyate tadapi bodhisattvo'dhivāsayati |
SA20n1315:108: kuśalapakṣābhiyuktasyāpi ca bodhisattvasya [ye] pariśramanidānā utpadyante kāyikāḥ klamāḥ caitasikāḥ apyupāyāsā na bodhisattvastannidānaṃ vīryaṃ saṃstrayati |
SA20n1315:116: yatpunarbodhisattvaḥ spṛṣṭaḥ sannanyatamena duḥkhena prayujyata evānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye |
SA20n1315:122: iha bodhisattvasya samyagdharmapravicayasuvicāritayā buddhyā aṣṭavidhe adhimuktyadhiṣṭhāne adhimuktiḥ susanniviṣṭā bhavati ratnaguṇeṣu tattvārthe buddhabodhisattvānāṃ mahāprabhāve hetau phale prāptavye'rthe ātmanastatprāptyupāye jñeyagocare ca |
SA20n1315:141: iha bodhisattvaḥ ādita eva kṣāntāvanuśaṃsadarśī bhavati |
SA20n1315:153: sā ṣaḍvidhā saptavidhā caikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya trayodaśavidhā veditavyā |
SA20n1315:155: sattveṣu ca dayācittaḥ kāruṇyacitta [snigdhacittaḥ] snehādapi kṣamate |
SA20n1315:156: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau tīvracchandaḥ kṣāntipāramitāṃ paripūrayitukāmaḥ kāraṇahetorapi kṣamate |
SA20n1315:158: tadanenāpi paryāyeṇa na yuktarūpā samāttaśīlasya pravrajitasyākṣāntiriti dharmasamādānato'pi kṣamate |
SA20n1315:159: gotrasampadi pūrvake ca kṣāntyabhyāse vartamāno'vasthitaḥ prakṛtyāpi kṣamate |
SA20n1315:160: [niḥ] sattvāṃśca sarvadharmān viditvā nirabhilāpyadharmamātradarśī dharmanidhyānato'pi kṣamate |
SA20n1315:164: rahasi vā mahājanasamakṣaṃ vā sarvakālañca kṣamate |
SA20n1315:165: pūrvāhne'pi madhyāhne'pi sāyāhne'pi rātrau ca divā vā'tī tamapyanāgatamapi pratyutpannamapi glāno'pi svastho'pi patito'pyutthito'pi |
SA20n1315:175: duḥkhitānāṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhāpanayanāya vyāyacchataḥ dharmān paryeṣataḥ dharmasyānudharme pratipadyabhānasya tāneva dharmān pareṣāṃ vistareṇa saṃprakāśayataḥ sattvakṛtyeṣu [sattvakaraṇīyeṣu] ca samyaksahāyībhāvaṃ gacchato yā vyavasāyasahiṣṇutā |
SA20n1315:177: yena ca sattvā vidhātinaḥ syuḥ tasya ca kṣāntyā parivarjanāt |
SA20n1315:181: iha bodhisattvaḥ apramatto viharan kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu kṣamo bhavati |
SA20n1315:182: śītasyoṣṇasya jighatsāpipāsayoḥ daṃśasaṃsparśānāṃ [maśakasaṃsparśānāṃ vātātapayoḥ sarīsṛpasaṃsparśānāṃ] kṣamo bhavati |
SA20n1315:184: saṃsārapatitajarāvyādhimaraṇādikānāṃ duḥkhānāṃ sattvānukampāmeva puraskṛtā ityevaṃ kṣamo bodhisattva ātmanā ca dṛṣṭe ca dharme sukhasaṃsparśaṃ viharatyavyavakīrṇaḥ pāpakairakuśalairdharmaiḥ |
SA20n1315:187: pareṣāmapi ca dṛṣṭe dharme saṃparāya sukhāya pratipanno bhavati |
SA20n1315:191: iha bodhisattvaḥ pareṣāmantikādapakāraṃ vighātaṃ vyatikramaṃ labhamāno nāpi pratyapakāraṃ karoti |
SA20n1315:194: upakārāya cābhimukho bhavati yathā pūrvaṃ tathā paścānnopakārakriyayā'pakāramupekṣate apakāriṣu ca svayameva saṃjñaptimanuprayacchati na ca khedayitvā pareṣāmantikāt saṃjñaptiṃ pratigṛhaṇāti khedito bhavatviti |
SA20n1315:195: etameva pratyayaṃ kṛtvā akṣāntimārabhya tīvreṇa [hrīvyapatrāpyena] samanvāgato bhavati |
SA20n1315:196: kṣāntimārabhya tīvreṇa śāstari premagauraveṇa samanvāgato bhavati |
SA20n1315:197: sattvāviheṭhanatāmārabhya tīvreṇa sattveṣu karuṇāśayena sanvāgato bhavati |
SA20n1315:198: sarveṇa vā sarvamakṣāntidharmasahāyaṃ prahāya kāmavītarāgo bhavati |
SA20n1315:200: ityetāṃ svabhāva-[kṣāntyādikaṃ viśuddha-] kṣāntiparyavasānāṃ kṣāntiṃ vipulāmapramāṇāṃ mahābodhiphalo [dayāṃ] niśritya bodhisattvo'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate |
SA20n1315:201: iti bodhisattvabhūmāvādhāre yogasthāne ekādaśamaṃ kṣāntipaṭalaṃ samāptam |
